snippet: In order to survive, Athens has no choice but to accept Europe’s conditions of harsher fiscal austerity.
abstract: Editorial contends that it is time for European leaders like German Chancellor Angela Merkel to drop failed tactic of trying to force Greece and other debtor nations to adopt ever-harsher austerity measures; asserts that only a combination of greater fiscal breathing room and pro-growth reforms can achieve the desired result; notes that by forcing Greeks to suffer with no real prospects of relief, Europe is uniting the country against further reforms.
lead_paragraph: In order to survive, Athens has no choice but to accept Europe’s conditions of harsher fiscal austerity.
